vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Γαλατία, -ας, ἡ,
Galatia;
__1. a gentilic region in Asia Minor, settled by Gauls (iii/B.C).
__2. A Roman Province which included this region (DB, ii, 85ff.): 1Co.16:1, Gal.1:2, 2Ti.4:10 (T, Tr., mg., Γαλλίαν), 1Pe.1:1.
† (From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Galatia, or Gallo-Graecia, a province of Asia Minor, 1Cor. 6:1; Gal. 1:2; 2Tim. 4:10; 1Pet. 1:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
加拉太 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "Galli或Gauls之地"
大約是小亞細亞半島中部地區的一個羅馬省份
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
加拉太 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "Galli或Gauls之地"
大约是小亚细亚半岛中部地区的一个罗马省份
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ga-la-ti: một xứ giữa Tiểu-Á-tế-á, ở về phía Ðông nam xứ Bi-thi-ni
